synopsis.text: Shuuichi's confession still lingers in Kumiko's mind as she enters her second year at Kitauji High School. This time around, the stakes are higher than ever for the concert band, as they set their sights on not just qualifying, but winning the National Championship. But with a fresh batch of first-year students, each with their own unique quirks and challenges, Kumiko finds herself in a mentorship role she never anticipated. Juggling her responsibilities to the band and her new senpai status, Kumiko must navigate the complexities of her relationships both old and new. Amidst the chaos, can Kumiko find the harmony she seeks and lead her band to victory? Join the Kitauji High School Concert Band in their thrilling new journey, filled with laughter, tears, and unforgettable performances!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
